paper_abstract: A bootstrap-based methodology is developed for parameter estimation and polyspectral density estimation in the case of the approximating model of the underlying stochastic process being non-minimum phase autoregressive-moving-average (ARMA) type, given a finite realisation of a single time series data. The method is based on a minimum phase/maximum phase decomposition of the system function together with a time reversal step for the parameter and polyspectral confidence interval estimation. Simulation examples are provided to illustrate the proposed method.
paper_title: A bootstrap-based approach for parameter and polyspectral density estimation of a non-minimum phase ARMA process
